ygData.subject: Re: BIBS
ygData.msgSnippet: The following post is not clear at all. You seem to be saying that there is a way to get the Dazed Goblin Knight to spawn quickly... but you don t tell us how
ygData.messageBody:
The following post is not clear at all. You seem to be saying that there is
a way to get the Dazed Goblin Knight to spawn quickly... but you don't tell
us how to do it. Please elaborate. Thanks.

BTW, I agree with some of the recent posters, I think it is utter horseshit
the way rare item loots are handled in this game; forcing people to camp 18+
hours to get an item is utter insanity. All the really cool stuff should
come from quests, anyway, not from just killing a mob.

----- Original Message -----
From: Mark S. Foster <markf@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, August 09, 1999 7:10 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 88


: From: "Mark S. Foster" <markf@...>
:
: There is a way, Well, It works for me to get the knight to Spawn( only to
: have a SK come and HT then go back invis after he looted the BIBS). Let me
: guess you where pulling all the spawns from the Crystal Hidden Room. A
: Ranger Showed me how to get the Knight to spawn in 1-12 Kills. But it
does
: take about hour to do. I did it that way last night and on the 8th kill,
he
: spawned.
:
: Rakasta Drache'Morder
